inclusion.criterion: Chinese subjects aged between 18 and 90 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of asthma according to GINA guideline 2019
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Consistent history and prior documented evidence of variable airflow obstruction
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of an increase in FEV1 greater than 12% or 200 mL following bronchodilator
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Respiratory diseases with other known respiratory diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Individuals older than 40 years with a smoking history of more than 10 pack-years
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
